definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Weekend, polyester and silk market continue to rise.
sentences.chinese: 雙休日，滌絲市場行情繼續盤升態勢。

sentences.english: At weekends, he bought a lot of gifts and she is gone.
sentences.chinese: 到雙休日了，他買了好多禮物和她出發了。

sentences.english: Every weekend, or even on the 8th National Day holiday, I have dedicated to the computer.
sentences.chinese: 每個雙休日，甚至國慶八日長假，我都奉獻給了電腦。

sentences.english: Days to relax and suburbs, such as holiday villa market prospects look good.
sentences.chinese: 雙休日來到郊區放鬆身心，度假類別墅市場前景看好。

sentences.english: Difficult got a dubble rest day, heart feeling also not wrong.
sentences.chinese: 難得一個雙休日，心情也不錯。

sentences.english: Two day weekends also bring with it some problems.
sentences.chinese: 雙休日也帶來一些問題。

sentences.english: Even with two-day weekends this year, you worked a lot of overtime.
sentences.chinese: 就算今年的周雙休日，你也加了很多班。

sentences.english: The first tourists peak is expected to come this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 本個雙休日桃花節將迎來首個賞花高峯。
